com.bandyer.android_common

Class FieldProperty<R,T>

  • com.bandyer.android_common.FieldProperty<R,T>
  • Type Parameters:
    R - property reference
    T - property value

    public class FieldProperty<R,T>

    Class to add a property to any existing class

    Example private var View.cornerRadius: Float by FieldProperty { 0f }

    with this line we will have the cornerRadius property available on all Views
